blog.name: citizen-of-the-fandom
blog.title: We're All Stories In The End
blog.description:
Well then. Procrastinating author who loves so many fandoms she couldn't pick one for her url.
Current obsessions include Doctor Who, Avengers (Loki), Bucky (Sebastian Stan), Queen's Thief (except SPOILERS b/c u know why), Megamind, Voltron Legendary Defender (Lotor), The Adventure Zone, Star Trek (sometimes), a few terrible and awful headcanons about Star Wars, and whatever else I feel like. I try not to post too many sad things, unless it's important.

summary:
Copic marker on a clear gem bead, making my own “amethyst” bracelet!
Got some green sculpey to make little beetles to pin in my...
body:
Copic marker on a clear gem bead, making my own “amethyst” bracelet!

Got some green sculpey to make little beetles to pin in my hair, and some faux fur for ears.

This cosplay is gonna be super casual but I’m having fun

summary: I had a dream that I was Beau from Critical Role and I was getting a tattoo of a peacock on my back in memory of Mollymauk. I...
body: I had a dream that I was Beau from Critical Role and I was getting a tattoo of a peacock on my back in memory of Mollymauk. I think it was from like Expositor Dairon. And my tat was a stick and poke tat and it hurt like a bitch, but it was worth it because it was keeping Molly’s legacy alive.

reblog.comment: I had a dream that I was Beau from Critical Role and I was getting a tattoo of a peacock on my back in memory of Mollymauk. I think it was from like Expositor Dairon. blog.name: dr-archeville
blog.title: Doktor Archeville's Laboratory
blog.description:
Hi!  I am a fat 40-something white introvert in NC.  I worked in the NCSU Libraries for 13 years, then was an insurance agent working with Aflac (quack!) for about 9 months, and currently work as a substitute teacher in Roxboro & a repairer/maintainer of sewing machines out of my home.
My preferred pronouns are he/him/his; my preferred nicknames are Doc or Dok, or Science Squid (or Jon).

I am a fan of... things.  So many things.
* Comics (DC Comics, Marvel Comics)
* Tabletop RPGs (Dungeons & Dragons/D&D/DnD, Eclipse Phase, GURPS, Pathfinder, Shadowrun, World of Darkness) (My OCs, my games)
* Video Games (Elder Scrolls series, Fallout series, Minecraft)
* Podcasts (Binging with Babish, Critical Role)
* Webcomics (Order of the Stick, Oglaf, SMBC, Schlock Mercenary, xkcd)
* Geek Culture /  Geek Life /  Misc. Geekery (including memes)

Basically, if it's got cosplay, fantasy, horror (esp. body horror and zombies), science (or SCIENCE!) & sci-fi, steampunk, or superheroes (or supervillains), I'll probably love it.

I also try to keep up with actual science and technology, especially body modification and transhumanism.
I also blog about libraries and library- & librarian-related things (including books), in part because I'd worked in a library for thirteen years, and about education (especially education in NC and education in America) due to my work in academic libraries and as a substitute teacher.  And about language and linguistics, as those fascinate me.
Also about jobs and job hunting, since I've been unemployed or underemployed for an uncomfortably long time, and we could all use a little help there.
I also enjoy cooking (and food), which is a type of science.  Here are some recipes I've collected.

This being the internet, I also reblog posts with cute animals.  I'm especially fond of bats.  And squid, cuttlefish, and other cephalopods. While I'm listing animals, I may as well provide a link to my cat posts.  It is the internet, so there are a lot of them.

I'm a big fan of/believer in people being themselves, and of consenting adults being able to do whatever they want however they want with whoever they want, no matter what others think.  (I.e., body positivity, sex positivity).  I try to keep this blog SFW -- the only porn I'll be posting here are food porn and technology porn -- but I do sometimes talk about sex (esp. sex education) and burlesque (there are some great burly troupes in the Triangle & Triad area).

I struggle with mild depression and anxiety issues, so sometimes my blog may get a bit maudlin.  But I also try to give advice on dealing with those, too.
-----------------------
Things I've Liked (Note: May contain some NSFW posts)
My Tumblr Crushes
My personal blargings
About Me / It Me
Getting To Know Me
My TMI Tuesday blargings
My Feels

Conventions!
* Animazement
* ConCarolinas
* ConTemporal
* Cosplay America
* Dragon*Con / Dragon Con

My Face
My Facebook
Art-related blargings
Music-related blargings
Most Fridays nights I’m at the Retro Film shows at the the Carolina Theatre in Durham.  Come join me!

Sam does his DnD Beyond bit ft. Mephistopheles -- Critical Role, Campaign 2, Episode 32

[source] “Unfortunately, without Satan...
caption:
Sam does his DnD Beyond bit ft. Mephistopheles – Critical Role, Campaign 2, Episode 32 [source]

“Unfortunately, without Satan at your back, I don’t think you’re allowed to play Dungeons & Dragons anymore… it’s kind of a requirement… if the 80′s taught us anything…”

summary:
Ok so today i was flipping through the Tal’Dorei Campain Setting and I took the time to actually read this 
GUYS
GUYS MOLLYMAUK...
body:
Ok so today i was flipping through the Tal’Dorei Campain Setting and I took the time to actually read this

GUYS

GUYS MOLLYMAUK USED TO BE PART OF THE CLARET ORDERS

The Orders were established by a priest of the Matron of Ravens when she told him how to use blood magic in order to stop a great evil.

Guys it was in Wildmount

GUYS THE TABAXI MOLLY (Lucien) USED TO KNOW IS A BLOOD CLERIC

YOU GUYS!!!!!

(Bonus: The Claret Orders is the only organization in the Campaign Guide we haven’t had any narrative ties to yet in either campaign)

summary: Before ep 26, I had been heavily planning for my Molly cosplay, however the events of ep 26 hit me pretty hard and I had to take...
caption:
Before ep 26, I had been heavily planning for my Molly cosplay, however the events of ep 26 hit me pretty hard and I had to take a break from crit role for a bit (for the sake of my own mental health). I also lost a lot of steam on working on the costume, and for a bit I didn’t think I was gonna do it anymore. However, after giving it some time, my motivation has come back, and I’m super excited to work on this costume now!

As such, here’s the outfit breakdown that I’d started a couple months ago, and have finally finished! I tried to get it as close to ornerine’s art as I could, but I obviously had to take some liberties (I made up the whole back and I kind of hate myself lmao). Feel free to use as a reference/inspiration for your own cosplay if you want, but credit would be appreciated!

tags: this was originally for the mollylivesfest but I made it sad
summary: Have You Checked The Lost-and-Found?
title: Have You Checked The Lost-and-Found?
description:
“Plus, hey,” Beau continued, drunkenly stumbling over her words, “We’re… We’re under a street lamp. A car wouldn’t… It would! It would see us.”

“Get out of the road!” Caleb slurred, swaying on his feet.

“It’s fine!” It took Beau and Keg far too long to notice the revving of a nearby engine.

They’d been stupid and drunk. Setting off firecrackers in the middle of the night had seemed like a great idea in the moment. They hadn’t meant for things to go so wrong.

-A Modern High school AU taking place roughly during the events of episode 26 with a lot of changes.-

summary: So I know we joke about him sounding like a stoner but I honestly love the vocal choice Taliesin made for Caduceus. Both the...
body: So I know we joke about him sounding like a stoner but I honestly love the vocal choice Taliesin made for Caduceus. Both the tone and cadence are super soothing and it sounds like what being wrapped in a warm blanket feels like.
